CreateClientResponse.summary: this class allow you save a instance of a actor into IActorRef.

CreateClientResponseC.summary: This constructor allow you create a instance of this class to save an instances of a actor in the system.
CreateClientResponseC.param: This parameter represent an instance of a actor in the system.

_actor.summary: This property is a IActorRef, this property allow you save the reference of a actor in the system
